video_title: Tom Holland opens up about his struggles with alcohol #shorts
transcript:
why was it so hard I just wanted to do
dry January and all I could think about
was having a drink I felt like I
couldn't be social I couldn't go out for
dinner I was really really struggling
and I started to really worry that maybe
I had an alcohol problem so I decided
that I would wait until my birthday
which is June 1st I said to myself if I
can do six months without alcohol then I
can prove to myself that I don't have a
problem and I just sort of said to
myself like why am I enslaved to this
drink and it's honestly been the best
thing I've ever done I'm a year and a
half into it now it doesn't even cross
my mind
